description:
You know the days. A light breeze, a light chop, and seas just sporty enough to bring you and your boat alive. The Bonavista is made for these days, to suit recreational kayak tourers and canoe trippers. The waterproof-breathable fabric is improved to be 40% lighter while retaining all the tensile and shear strength of original design.

  • eXhaust 2.5 ply waterproof-breathable fabric is light, but has excellent tear strength
  • Pack-away storm hood
  • Fleece-lined collar has die-cut breath holes, allowing you to draw air inside collar during intense wind and rain
  • Sleeve pocket with waterproof zipper
  • Neoprene cuffs keep your arms dry, while fabric overcuffs tone down the paddling look
  • Adjustable neoprene waist
name: Level Six Torngat Paddling Top - Men's
